root.name: Annotation
root.description: Simple tool for annotations / notes on your sequences. (This plugin requires Icy v. 1.2.0.0)
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2012-03-12 15:07:43
New feature: painters for notes. - Not a painter for every note anymore - Notes are grouped by specific painters called PainterNotes
Warning XML Modifications: XML files are no longer compatibles with this version of Annotation. A small fix is necessary.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-01-16 11:28:49
Updated to 1.2
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-12-16 16:56:56
More intuitive. More powerful. XMLPersistent data.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2011-12-13 17:15:15
